title: 64 Lord, Dismiss Us With Thy Blessing

lines: 1. Lord, dismiss us with Thy blessing; Fill our hearts with joy and peace; Let us each, Thy love possessing, Triumph in redeeming grace. O refresh us, O refresh us, Travelling through this wilderness.
2. Thanks we give, and adoration, For Thy gospel's joyful sound. May the fruits of Thy salvation In our hearts and lives abound. Ever faithful, ever faithful To the truth may we be found.
